**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title:** Supplemental Invitation to Commercial Space Situational Awareness Observations

**Reference Number:** WS3501721826-Doc4000089100

**Publication Date:** May 8, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** August 9, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET

**Amendment Number:** Amendment 9
**Solicitation Number:** WS3501721826
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites industry stakeholders to provide information and feedback regarding commercially available Space Situational Awareness Observations services. The purpose of this Request for Information (RFI) is to explore potential options, refine the requirement, and understand the current state of the market.

**Background:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to acquire a commercially available Space Situational Awareness Observations service to support its operations. The PSPC is seeking industry input to ensure that the procurement requirements accurately reflect the needs of DND.

**Key Details:**

* **UNSPSC Code:** 81151605 (Satellite Imaging and Image Processing Service)
* **Regions of Delivery:** United States of America and Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: David Lee (PSPC)
	+ Email: [david.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16208531](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16208531)
---
